creator: Cointab
descriptionHtml:
Mobile Banking for 140+ Banks in India via BHIM UPI, Bank Account Balance Check, Money Transfer, Fixed Deposit, Insurance, Credit Card Bill Payments, Recharges, Electricity & Gas Bill Payments, EPF Balance Check, EPF Passbook View, Expense Manager, Split Bill and Financial Calculators.

The app is based on BHIM UPI platform.

Top Features

Add multiple bank accounts
You can add multiple Savings and Current accounts from 140+ banks in India and manage them online.

Check bank balance
Bank balance check in real-time! No fees for checking bank balance

Transfer money in real-time
- To friends & family, Self account, Account number + IFSC, Merchants. 24x7. Even on weekends and holidays
- Transfer upto INR 1,00,00 per transaction
- No fees for transferring money

Credit Card Bill Payment
- Pay credit card bills of all banks such as HDFC, SBI, Citibank, ICICI, Axis, Kotak, American Express, Standard Chartered, HSBC, RBL, etc.
- All Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Diners Club, RuPay cards supported

Employee Provident Fund (EPF)
- Activate UAN (Universal Account Number)
- EPF balance check, passbook view & download

Fixed Deposit
- Book fixed deposit online and earn upto 8.5% interest rate
- Pre-mature withdrawal allowed without any penalties

Insurance
- Buy life insurance, starting at Rs. 170/year
- Buy health insurance (mediclaim), starting at Rs. 1,180/year
- Buy personal accident insurance, starting at Rs. 118/year
- Buy home insurance, starting at Rs. 249/year

Bank in 12 languages
English, Hindi, Marathi, Gujarati, Bengali, Punjabi, Kannada, Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Assamese, Oriya

Mobile/ DTH Recharge & Mobile/ Electricity/ Water/ Gas/ Broadband/ Landline/ Insurance Bill Payment
- Get notified when your mobile recharge plans are expiring and when your bills are generated with bill details and pay instantly from bank account


Split Bill
- Easily add bills and split payment with friends
- Settle expenses with friends by making payment from your bank account

Calculators
- Loan Eligibility, Loan EMI
- Mutual Fund, SIP, Fixed Deposit, & Recurring Deposit

Expense Manager
- Easily note daily expenses
- See how much you are spending across different categories

BHIM UPI supported banks in India
